trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Elkhart
There were no other sightings in Elkhart on or around August 10th 2011
Summary: No movement looked like star then moved a little stopped then went fast
divs: sighting detailsit was around 9:30pm i was laying in bed and heard my mom yelling for me. i ignored her like usual until she said ufo! she said look out the window there is a bright light just sitting still it looks like a star until it moves. i went out to the backyard and saw what looked like a huge bright star. at the time there was no movement. then all of a sudden it started to move my way just a little then stopped again.at this time it still looked like a bright star and there was no noise. then right before it started moving again a humming\jet like sound started coming from it.then it started moving and it went from a bright ball of light to a triangular shape and you could see a few blue and green lights on it. it moved really fast after that and by the time i made it to the front yard it was gone but you could see the back of a helicopter going in the same direction it went. how was i feeling when i saw it? excited and nervous
